name: ac-sync-server
description: Synchorize data between local and cloud for Access control

scripts.prisma:update: npx prisma db pull --schema src/prisma/maindb.schema.prisma && npx prisma db pull --schema src/prisma/subdb.schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:generate: npx prisma generate --schema src/prisma/maindb.schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema src/prisma/subdb.schema.prisma

author: Emddi
